item.title: Notes for MSc. Data Science at CMI
item.description: Semester 1 (Aug - Nov 2022) Programming and Data Structures in Python 4 credits course. Introduction to Python Programming Object Oriented programming There’s a section on linked lists and flexible lists in it as well. Associated Jupyter Notebook For NumPy and Pandas I would recommend the following resources: Introduction to NumPy Data Manipulation with Pandas Probability and Statistics with R 4 credits course. Class notes for probability and statistics R programming classwork (Contains code for some things shown in the class notes.
